title: Can you copy and paste into a Minecraft book? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some newer versions allow it as far as i remember, not sure about bedrock Just use CTRL+C to copy the text and CTRL+V to paste it (you can select text within a minecraft book by holding shift and pressing the arrow keys) You can also make copies of a book by placing a signed book and an empty book on a crafting table
